introduction: SYNOPSISSix years ago, Jin-hi went to a Buddhist temple due to problems with her husband. She met Min-ho who was there to take pictures for his exhibition. The two ended up sleeping together. Jin-hi and Min-ho both treasure the memories of their meeting. On a quiet subway platform, the two meet again. Overwhelmed by his love for her, Min-ho tries to possess Jin-hi even if it means breaking up her family. Finally, Min-ho kidnaps Jin-hi's son. However, when Min-ho, Jin-hi, and her husband meet, she confesses that the father of her son is actually Min-ho. Her husband anguishes but soon forgives Jin-hi and embraces her.故事六年前，发现一个家庭斗争的寺庙的金熙与来自她的工作画面的Minho有着亲切的关系。保留这样一个过去记忆的两名男女在地铁站再次相遇。Minho再次激怒了她的爱，摧毁了她的家人，试图占领金辉，但是她最终还是和金和的凶手绑架了她的儿子。但是，当Minho，Jinhee和三位丈夫见面时，Jinhei透露，六年前他的儿子是Minho的孩子，丈夫不安，但丈夫原谅Jinhee并再次接受。
